articles.title: French actor Gérard Depardieu under formal investigation for alleged rape and sexual assault - CNN
articles.description: Gérard Depardieu is under formal investigation in France for alleged rape and sexual assault, judicial sources have confirmed to CNN. The movie star has been under investigation since December last year, they said.
